name: Outbreak (itch) (Elcanetay)
description:
A countryside man lives in a house with his family. After the loss of his second son and the diagnosis of a mental disease, he starts to witness some unnatural events around the house

This is a prototype game made with a friend, for a final examination of a game course in 2018.

Instructions :  Click on items to grab, inspect or interact with them. Walk through doors to open it.
